sentences.en: As parts of the world become uninhabitable, millions of people will try to migrate to more hospitable areas.
sentences.cn: 随着世界的一些地方变得不适人居，数以百万计的人将会试图迁移到环境更加宜人的地区。

sentences.en: Birds usually migrate from north to south.
sentences.cn: 鸟类通常由北向南迁徙。

sentences.en: DDT molecules in water tend to migrate to the surface.
sentences.cn: 在水中滴滴涕分子趋向于向水面移动.

sentences.en: Farmers have learned that they have to migrate if they want to survive.
sentences.cn: 农民们已经认识到，想要生存就必须外出打工。

sentences.en: Instinct impels the cuckoo to migrate.
Large numbers of birds migrate south every winter.
sentences.cn: 每年冬季大量的鸟类迁徙南方.

sentences.en: Most birds have to fly long distances to migrate.
sentences.cn: 大多数的鸟类不得不飞行很长的距离进行迁徙。

sentences.en: People migrate to cities like Jakarta in search of work.
sentences.cn: 人们为找工作而迁移到雅加达这类城市里。

sentences.en: Some birds migrate as season changes.
Some birds migrate to warmer countries in ( the ) winter.
sentences.cn: 有些鸟会在冬天移栖到较温暖的地方.
燕子在冬天迁徙到南方。

sentences.en: The rich people often migrate in winter to Florida.
sentences.cn: 有钱的人常在冬季搬迁到佛罗里达州去.

sentences.en: The whales migrate some 6,000 miles to breed and calve in the warm lagoons.
sentences.cn: 鲸会迁移6,000海里左右，到温暖的环礁湖生殖繁衍。

sentences.en: These birds migrate northwards in spring and southwards in fall.
sentences.cn: 这些鸟春天向北迁徙,秋天向南迁徙.

sentences.en: Wealthy people often migrate in winter to warmer and sunnier places.
sentences.cn: 富有的人冬天常移往温暖而日照好一点儿的地方去.

words.tran_cn: 候鸟；移居者；随季节迁移的民工
移动；随季节而移居；移往

trans.tran_en: if birds or animals migrate, they travel regularly from one part of the world to another

trans.tran_cn: 迁移，移往，移动，随季节而移居
trans.tran_en: if birds or animals migrate, they travel regularly from one part of the world to another
